mapper.select: select empNo, name, clock_time, punch_kind FROM punching p JOIN employee e ON e.empNo = p.empNo WHERE empNo = #{empNo} AND punch_kind = '출근' AND TO_CHAR(clock_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO punch_clock (clockNo, empNo, punch_kind) VALUES (punch_clock_seq.NEXTVAL, #{empNo},'출근')
mapper.select: select empNo, name, TO_CHAR(clock_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') clock_time, punch_kind FROM punching p JOIN employee e ON e.empNo = p.empNo WHERE empNo = #{empNo} AND punch_kind = '퇴근' AND TO_CHAR(clock_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
